name: Untitled Oil Game
description:
Bring freedom to petroleum-exporting alien worlds. Quickly thrown together for Untitled Game Jam #68. There's only one level and no sound.

Controls:

  • Move with A/D or left stick.
  • Aim with mouse movement or right stick.
  • Shoot with left mouse, right trigger, or the "A" button.

Art by RandomPickle97, coded by organicpencil
